{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TRENDnet |model=TEW-827DRU |revision=1.0R |upc=710931160727 |ean=0710931160727 |serialnum_prefix=C2155027 |asin=B00S7NK8Y0;US; |price=240.00 |est_release_date=01/14/2015 |fcc_date=11/26/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Cameo |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=XU8TEW827DRU |ic_id=6337A-TEW827DRU |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8064 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34MS02G200BHI000 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (57600,8,N,1),, JP1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C, PE53648, K1, 1530, TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |flags=MU-MIMO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2012.07; |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=LEDE Project |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid_regex=^TRENDnet827_2.4GHz_[A-Z0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=''randomly generated'' }} {{TagLine|AC2600 StreamBoost MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router}} :[http://www.trendnet.com/products/proddetail.asp?prod=100_TEW-827DRU Product Page] :[https://www.trendnet.com/downloads/list_gpl.asp ''OEM GPL source download'']
Based on the FCC photos, Cameo is presumed to be the manufacturer.
*[[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 @1.4GHz dual-core processor, 2x USB 3.0 ports *Quad-stream AC2600: 1733Mbps on 5GHz and 800Mbps on 2.4GHz
===Product Info=== *[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gU2iZlgE3wI ''Youtube: TRENDnet AC2600 MU-MIMO WiFi Router - TEW-827DRU'']
